Amatoritsero Ede bụ onye Naijiria-Canada na-ede uri

O dere n'okpuru aha "Godwin Ede" mana ọ kwụsịrị iburu aha mbụ ya nke Onye Kraịst dị ka ụzọ iji mee mkpesa megide xenophobia na ịkpa ókè agbụrụ ọ chọpụtara na Germany, mba "Ndị Kraịst", na ruo n'ókè, iji mee mkpasu iwe megide ọchịchị ọdịda anyanwụ n'ozuzu
Ede ebiela na Canada kemgbe afọ 2002, nke PEN Canada kwadoro dị ka onye edemede na-agba ọsọ
Ọ bụ onye Hindu Monk na Hare Krishna Movement, ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye nchịkọta akwụkwọ na nnukwu onye na-ebipụta akwụkwọ na Naijiria,
Ede bụ onye na-ebipụta ma na-achịkwa nchịkọta akụkọ nke

n'agbata 2005 na 2007 o deziri akwụkwọ akụkọ uri n'ịntanetị nke mba ụwa, uri sentinel n'ịntanetị.LTree Literary Supplement (MTLnline. Ọ bụ onye edemede bi na Mahadum Carleton, Ottawa, Canada, n'okpuru nkwado nke PEN Canada's Writer-in-Exile network
Ọ bụkwa onye SSHRC Fellow na Doctoral Candidate na akwụkwọ Bekee na Mahadum Carleton, nke o nwetara na PhD ya na 2013
[citation needed] Akwụkwọ edemede doctoral ya akpọrọ "The Global Literary Canon and Minor African Literatures," nyocha ọdịbendị nke ịdị n'okpuru akwụkwọ edemede Africa nke oge a na nnukwu obodo
[citation mkpa] O nwere BA na MA na Postcolonial Anglophone Literatures and German Linguistics site na Mahaduma Hanover, Germany
